mean_cn: n. ［医］综合病症；同时存在的事物
mean_en: a disease or disorder that involves a particular group of signs and symptoms
word_etyma: syn一起 + drome前行 → syndrome 并发症
short_phrase: carpal tunnel syndrome in one's wrists
sentence: Many people suffer from post-holiday syndrome after a long vacation.
sentence_trans: 许多人在长假结束时都可能惹上"节后"综合症。
